messages.body:
<azizi_nwamka@latinmail.com>

FROM THE DESK OF MR AZIZI  NWAMKA.
BILL AND EXCHANGE MANAGER
BANK OF AFRICAN.
OUAGADOUGOU, BURKINA FASO.
WEST AFRICA
CALL ME IMMEDIATELY: 226-70431685.


                   TREAT URGENTLY AND CONFIDENTIAL.

DEAR,

HOW ARE YOU, FIRST I WILL EXPLAIN MY SELF IN BRIEF
FOR YOU BEFORE WE PROCEED. I AM THE MANAGER OF BILL
AND EXCHANGE AT THE FOREIGN REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT OF
BANK  OF  AFRICA (BOA)  I AM WRITING TO SEEK YOUR
INTEREST OVER A BUSINESS , IN MY DEPARTMENT WE
DISCOVERED AN ABANDONED SUM OF $20M US DOLLARS (
TWENTY MILLION US DOLLARS).

 IN AN ACCOUNT THAT BELONGS TO ONE OF OUR FOREIGN
CUSTOMER ( MR. ANDREAS SCHRANNER FROM MUNICH,
GERMANY) WHO DIED ALONG WITH HIS ENTIRE FAMILY IN
NOVEMBER15TH 2000  IN A PLANE CRASH.

HTTP://NEWS.BBC.CO.UK/1/HI/WORLD/EUROPE/859479.STM

SINCE WE GOT INFORMATION ABOUT HIS DEATH, WE HAVE
BEEN EXPECTING HIS NEXT OF KIN TO COME OVER AND
CLAIM HIS MONEY BECAUSE WE CANNOT RELEASE IT UNLESS
HIS NEXT OF KIN OR RELATIVE APPLIES FOR IT AS NEXT
OF KIN OR RELATION TO THE DECEASED AS INDICATED IN
OUR BANKING GUIDELINES BUT UNFORTUNATELY WE LEARNT
THAT ALL HIS SUPPOSED NEXT OF KIN OR RELATION DIED
ALONGSIDE WITH HIM AT THE PLANE CRASH LEAVING NOBODY
BEHIND FOR THE CLAIM. 

IT IS THEREFORE UPON THIS DISCOVERY THAT I AND TWO
OTHER OFFICIALS IN MY DEPARTMENT NOW DECIDED TO
ESCAPE WITH THE FUND, AND AS SUCH WE VIAL TO MAKE
THIS BUSINESS PROPOSAL TO YOU SO THAT MY BANK WILL
RELEASE THE FUND INTO YOUR ACCOUNT AS THE NEXT OF
KIN TO OUR BANK DECEASED CUSTOMER FOR SAFETY AND
SUBSEQUENT DISBURSEMENT SINCE NOBODY IS COMING FOR
CLAIMS AND WE DON'T WANT THIS MONEY TO GO INTO THE
BANK TREASURY.

INFECT I KNOW THE FUND WILL NOT EVEN GO INTO THE
BANK TREASURY, BUT OUR TOP BANK OFFICIALS
(DIRECTORS) WILL ONLY SHARE IT AMONG THEMSELVES INTO
THEIR ACCOUNTS.

THE BANKING LAW AND GUIDELINE HERE IN BURKINA FASO
STIPULATES THAT IF ANY CUSTOMER ACCOUNT OR PROPERTY
REMAINS UNSERVICEABLE OR DORMANT, AND UNCLAIMED
AFTER FIVE YEARS, THE ACCOUNT WILL BE CONFISCATED
AND TRANSFERRED INTO THE BANK TREASURY AS UNCLAIMED
BILL.
THE REQUEST OF  FOREIGNER AS NEXT OF KIN IN THIS
BUSINESS IS OCCASIONED BY THE FACT THAT THE CUSTOMER
WAS A FOREIGNER AND BURKINABE CANNOT STAND AS NEXT
OF KIN TO A FOREIGNER.

WE AGREE THAT 30% OF THIS MONEY WILL BE FOR YOU AS
FOREIGN PARTNER, IN RESPECT TO THE PROVISION OF A
FOREIGN ACCOUNT, AND YOUR IMENSE CONTRIBUTION TO
CHAMPION THE COURSE OF TRANSFERRING THE FUND TO YOUR
ACCOUNT.  10 % WILL BE SET ASIDE FOR EXPENSES
INCURRED BY THE BOTH PARTY DURING THE BUSINESS AND
60 %  WOULD BE FOR ME AND MY COLLEAGUES. 
THERE AFTER I AND MY COLLEAGUES WILL VISIT YOUR
COUNTRY FOR DISBURSEMENT ACCORDING TO THE
PERCENTAGES INDICATED. 
THEREFORE TO ENABLE MY BANK TRANSFER THE FUND INTO
YOUR ACCOUNT,I WILL SEND TO YOU THE TEXT OF
APPLICATION WHICH YOU WILL SEND TO MY BANK AS NEXT
OF KIN TO THE DECEASED CUSTOMER AND THAT WILL BE
WHEN YOU INDICATE YOUR INTEREST IN THE BUSINESS, YOU
MUST APPLY FIRST TO THE BANK AS RELATIONS OR NEXT OF
KIN OF OUR BANK DECEASED INDICATING YOUR BANK NAME,
YOUR BANK ACCOUNT NUMBER, YOUR PRIVATE TELEPHONE AND
FAX NUMBER FOR EASY AND EFFECTIVE COMMUNICATION AND
LOCATION WHERE IN THE MONEY WILL BE REMITTED.
UPON RECEIPT OF YOUR REPLY, I WILL SEND TO YOU BY
FAX OR EMAIL THE TEXT OF THE APPLICATION. 

I WILL NOT FAIL TO BRING TO YOUR NOTICE THAT THIS
TRANSACTION  IS RISK-FREE AND THAT YOU SHOULD NOT
ENTERTAIN ANY ATOM OF FEAR AS ALL REQUIRED
INFORMATIONS WILL BE PERFECTLY MADE FOR YOU TO
CHAMPION THE COURSE OF THE TRANSACTION WITH MY BANK
WITHOUT ANY HITCH OR RISK .

YOU SHOULD CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY AS SOON AS YOU
RECEIVE THIS LETTER.

TRUSTING TO HEAR FROM YOU IMMEDIATELY.
YOUR'S SINCERELY,
MR  AZIZI  NWAMKA.
BILL AND EXCHANGE MANAGER(BOA)

IN AN ACCOUNT THAT BELONGS TO ONE OF OUR FOREIGN CUSTOMER ( MR. ANDREAS SCHRANNER FROM MUNICH, GERMANY) WHO DIED ALONG WITH HIS ENTIRE FAMILY IN NOVEMBER15TH 2000 IN A PLANE CRASH.

HTTP://NEWS.BBC.CO.UK/1/HI/WORLD/EUROPE/859479.STM

SINCE WE GOT INFORMATION ABOUT HIS DEATH, WE HAVE BEEN EXPECTING HIS NEXT OF KIN TO COME OVER AND CLAIM HIS MONEY BECAUSE WE CANNOT RELEASE IT UNLESS HIS NEXT OF KIN OR RELATIVE APPLIES FOR IT AS NEXT OF KIN OR RELATION TO THE DECEASED AS INDICATED IN OUR BANKING GUIDELINES BUT UNFORTUNATELY WE LEARNT THAT ALL HIS SUPPOSED NEXT OF KIN OR RELATION DIED ALONGSIDE WITH HIM AT THE PLANE CRASH LEAVING NOBODY BEHIND FOR THE CLAIM.

IT IS THEREFORE UPON THIS DISCOVERY THAT I AND TWO OTHER OFFICIALS IN MY DEPARTMENT NOW DECIDED TO ESCAPE WITH THE FUND, AND AS SUCH WE VIAL TO MAKE THIS BUSINESS PROPOSAL TO YOU SO THAT MY BANK WILL RELEASE THE FUND INTO YOUR ACCOUNT AS THE NEXT OF KIN TO OUR BANK DECEASED CUSTOMER FOR SAFETY AND SUBSEQUENT DISBURSEMENT SINCE NOBODY IS COMING FOR CLAIMS AND WE DON'T WANT THIS MONEY TO GO INTO THE BANK TREASURY.

INFECT I KNOW THE FUND WILL NOT EVEN GO INTO THE BANK TREASURY, BUT OUR TOP BANK OFFICIALS (DIRECTORS) WILL ONLY SHARE IT AMONG THEMSELVES INTO THEIR ACCOUNTS.

THE BANKING LAW AND GUIDELINE HERE IN BURKINA FASO STIPULATES THAT IF ANY CUSTOMER ACCOUNT OR PROPERTY REMAINS UNSERVICEABLE OR DORMANT, AND UNCLAIMED AFTER FIVE YEARS, THE ACCOUNT WILL BE CONFISCATED AND TRANSFERRED INTO THE BANK TREASURY AS UNCLAIMED BILL.
THE REQUEST OF FOREIGNER AS NEXT OF KIN IN THIS BUSINESS IS OCCASIONED BY THE FACT THAT THE CUSTOMER WAS A FOREIGNER AND BURKINABE CANNOT STAND AS NEXT OF KIN TO A FOREIGNER.

WE AGREE THAT 30% OF THIS MONEY WILL BE FOR YOU AS FOREIGN PARTNER, IN RESPECT TO THE PROVISION OF A FOREIGN ACCOUNT, AND YOUR IMENSE CONTRIBUTION TO CHAMPION THE COURSE OF TRANSFERRING THE FUND TO YOUR ACCOUNT. 10 % WILL BE SET ASIDE FOR EXPENSES INCURRED BY THE BOTH PARTY DURING THE BUSINESS AND 60 % WOULD BE FOR ME AND MY COLLEAGUES. THERE AFTER I AND MY COLLEAGUES WILL VISIT YOUR COUNTRY FOR DISBURSEMENT ACCORDING TO THE PERCENTAGES INDICATED.

THEREFORE TO ENABLE MY BANK TRANSFER THE FUND INTO YOUR ACCOUNT,I WILL SEND TO YOU THE TEXT OF APPLICATION WHICH YOU WILL SEND TO MY BANK AS NEXT OF KIN TO THE DECEASED CUSTOMER AND THAT WILL BE WHEN YOU INDICATE YOUR INTEREST IN THE BUSINESS, YOU MUST APPLY FIRST TO THE BANK AS RELATIONS OR NEXT OF KIN OF OUR BANK DECEASED INDICATING YOUR BANK NAME, YOUR BANK ACCOUNT NUMBER, YOUR PRIVATE TELEPHONE AND FAX NUMBER FOR EASY AND EFFECTIVE COMMUNICATION AND LOCATION WHERE IN THE MONEY WILL BE REMITTED. UPON RECEIPT OF YOUR REPLY, I WILL SEND TO YOU BY FAX OR EMAIL THE TEXT OF THE APPLICATION.

I WILL NOT FAIL TO BRING TO YOUR NOTICE THAT THIS TRANSACTION IS RISK-FREE AND THAT YOU SHOULD NOT ENTERTAIN ANY ATOM OF FEAR AS ALL REQUIRED INFORMATIONS WILL BE PERFECTLY MADE FOR YOU TO CHAMPION THE COURSE OF THE TRANSACTION WITH MY BANK WITHOUT ANY HITCH OR RISK .

YOU SHOULD CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THIS LETTER.

TRUSTING TO HEAR FROM YOU IMMEDIATELY.
YOUR'S SINCERELY,
MR AZIZI NWAMKA.
BILL AND EXCHANGE MANAGER(BOA)

[This is your basic Dead Bank Customer variant of the 419 advance fee fraud scam. But you knew that.]

Mikhail Stroganov

NWANKA

WHAT IS THIS??

- S

messages.body:
<azizi_nwamka@yahoo.com>

Dear Mikhail Stroganov, 

  Greetings, I received your mail and was very happy
to ready positively from you, I also want to
re-assure you of my total support and co-operation
towards the execution and actualisation of this
business transaction.
I am sure that you must gone through my proposal
very well before responding to me, the matter like I
have explained it to you is authentic and the fund
in question is real, and the transaction 100% 
risk-free and very fast rewarding which I believe
must interested you.  

You should not entertain any fear whatsoever as
regards to the HITCH-FREE transfer of this fund into
your nominated bank account, and the necessary
needed for the transfer of this fund into your
nominated bank account has bee put in place and I
promise you that if you abide to all our
transactional rules, instruction and professional
advice as i would give you, that before 14 BANK
WORKING DAYS, this fund will enter into your
nominated bank account.

I have forwarded you with the text of application
below (HOW YOU WILL ADDRESS THE APPLICATION FOR
CLAIMS TO THE BANK WITH ALL THE FULL DETAILS OF OUR
DECEASED ACCOUNT HOLDER) to you. You will then go
through the application before mailing it to the
bank.

  Immediately you send the application to the bank,
there will be a board of directorÕs meeting in which
there will be an inquiry on the activity and the
person of MR. ANDREAS SCHRANNER (that is the name of
the deceased customer) after that the board will
contact the audit and verification unit to get all
the vital information on the life of Mr. Andreas
Schranner after which the bank will get back to you
with there of official questionnaire, in this
questionnaire. The bank will request from you all
the information about the deceased as the supposed
next of kin.

Please I advise you to maintain maximum secrecy
concerning this business transaction from you how
till the end. Also I want you to re-assure me that I
will not regret contacting you for such transaction
that required maximum trust and honesty.

I will retire from the PUBLIC SERVICE any moment as
soon as I shall conclude this deal with you. Note
that this fund belong to a foreigner but regrettably
he died with his family in a plane crash in 2000 and
so far nobody came to our to demand this fund as
heir to the decease and being from Burkina-Faso, I
can not demand this fund because it belong to a
foreigner and only a foreigner can demand this fund.

I do not know you before but your carefulness in
responding to my mail interested me that am why I
decided to give you all the details to know whether
you can make the transaction with me. You can either
be a next of kin or partner or anything depending on
what I decide. No one is aware of this fund and
again I want you to know that if you are serious
towards this transaction, we are going to make a
success. I have the belief you are honest. I need
you to send your account details where you want the
fund to be transferred.

Dont be afraid because I am here to give you all the
guidelines required.
I want you to tell me more about yourself also.
I have some questions for you.

Please this is my private phone number:+226-7043
1685. You can also call me if the bank requires any
information from you which you are unable to provide
and any time you want so that we discuss better or
you E-mail me so that i will know the step to
follow.
  I will retire from the public service any moment
as soon as i shall conclude this deal with you. Note
that this must be transferred into account under 7
working days counting from the day of submission of
your application and approval by our bank. Know that
it will have no handing back after the cost of the
transfer is being paid. Note that you will be
entitled to 40% of the totality of the sum and 10%
will drawn  apart for all the expenses which will
occur during the cost of the transaction and then
50% will before me and my associates.

I await your answers as urgency implies. Thank you
and my respect to your beautiful family and to hope
to me with you soon.
Look forward to hearing from you soonest.
Telephone:+226-7043 1685.
Mr Azizi  Nwamka.

international passport as soon as you receive this
message with my international passport.

transfer into your bank account as next of the
kin.My private number is: +226-70 431 685.

  Thanks and best regards,
  Mr Azizi Nwamka.
